title: enduseroverview
introduction: Welcome to your new Learning Management System! This short video will guide you through key features, so you can hit the ground running. Letâ€™s get started!

steps.title: Login Using Single Sign-On
steps.details:
1. Click the link from the email notice or intranet page
  2. If not on the network, log into your Fairview Office365 account

hotspots.title: Fairview Logo
hotspots.description: Click here anytime you wish to return to the Welcome page

steps.title: Launch an Online Course
steps.details:
1. Click on action link or course title
  2. Click the black "Launch button" to start the online course

steps.title: Enroll in a session
steps.details:
1. Click "Select Session" action link
  2. Find the date and time of the perfered class you want to enroll in
  3. Click the "View Details" black box
  4. Click the "Request" black box to enroll into the session

hotspots.title: Successfully Completed Action
hotspots.description: After requesting a session, a green check mark on the bottom left-hand side will appear briefly stating you have successfully enroll into the session.

steps.title: Open a Curriculum
steps.details:
1. Click on "Open Curriculum" action link under Assigned Training
  2. From here choose to launch any of the learning objects within the curriculum to get started

steps.title: Self-Enrolling via Course Catalog
steps.details:
1. Click on the "Catalog" tab on the Welcome page (It's the one with the magnifying glass next to it)
  2. Find the training you wish by either using the search bar or filters on the side
  3. Click on the title of the training you want to do
  4. Click the "Launch" black button or click the drowpdown arrow and save it for a later time to complete

hotspots.title: Search Bar
hotspots.description: Use the search bar if you know the title of the training you want

hotspots.title: Filters
hotspots.description: Use the filters available to find the training you want if you don't know the exact title

steps.title: View Your Transcript
steps.details:
1. Click on the "My Transcript" tab to access your transcript and any training
  2. Use any of the dropdown filters to pull up a specific training you want to view

steps.title: Reach out to the LMS team with any questions
steps.details: If you have questions about these processes, reach out to the LMS team by emailing us at LMS@fairview.org.
